### 14.1 Создание и использование секретов

- Как создать секрет?
```
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ openssl genrsa -out cert.key 4096
Generating RSA private key, 4096 bit long modulus (2 primes)
........................................................................................++++
.................................................++++
e is 65537 (0x010001)
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ openssl req -x509 -new -key cert.key -days 3650 -out cert.crt -subj '/C=RU/ST=Moscow/L=Moscow/CN=server.local'
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl create secret tls domain-cert --cert=cert.crt --key=cert.key
secret/domain-cert created
```

- Как просмотреть список секретов?

```
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl get secrets 
NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      13s
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl get secret
NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      15s
```

- Как просмотреть секрет?

```
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl get secret domain-cert 
NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      31s
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl describe secret domain-cert 
Name:         domain-cert
Namespace:    default
Labels:       <none>
Annotations:  <none>

Type:  kubernetes.io/tls

Data
====
tls.key:  3243 bytes
tls.crt:  1944 bytes
```

- Как получить информацию в формате YAML и/или JSON?

```
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml
apiVersion: v1
data:
  tls.crt: 
  tls.key: 
kind: Secret
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: "2022-11-10T17:08:25Z"
  name: domain-cert
  namespace: default
  resourceVersion: "3368"
  uid: 8e564fc6-0b98-40f8-a8a5-decb6b580585
type: kubernetes.io/tls
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o json
{
    "apiVersion": "v1",
    "data": {
        "tls.crt": "",
        "tls.key": ""
    },
    "kind": "Secret",
    "metadata": {
        "creationTimestamp": "2022-11-10T17:08:25Z",
        "name": "domain-cert",
        "namespace": "default",
        "resourceVersion": "3368",
        "uid": "8e564fc6-0b98-40f8-a8a5-decb6b580585"
    },
    "type": "kubernetes.io/tls"
}
```

- Как выгрузить секрет и сохранить его в файл?

```
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl get secrets -o json > secrets.json
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml > domain-cert.yml
```

- Как удалить секрет?

```
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl delete secret domain-cert
secret "domain-cert" deleted
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl get secrets
No resources found in default namespace.
```

- Как загрузить секрет из файла?

```
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl apply -f domain-cert.yml
secret/domain-cert created
vlad@home:~/Documents/Netology/DevOps/netology-DevOps-dz_65$ kubectl get secrets
NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      2s
```
